title: Deals: New iPad Air 5 now $70 off, official Apple AirTag Loops from $21, more
content:
All of Thursday’s best deals are now headlined by Apple’s all-new iPad Air 5 from $559 at Amazon. That’s alongside official Apple AirTag Loops from $21 in both leather and silicone varieties and the Bose ANC Headphones 700 from $237. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: New iPad Air 5 now $70 off, official Apple AirTag Loops from $21, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: New iPad Air 5 Amazon discounts have arrived that take as much as $70 off. That's alongside official AirTag loops from $21 and more.
